MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L19 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Meredith Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:36AM. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20AM on 05 November 2020.
